files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.ComplexChar
files.Summary: A Curses, back-end-specific complex character that encodes the rune and its attributes.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesBackend
files.Summary: Provides functionality for obtaining instances.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesBackendFlavor
files.Summary: Lists the supported backend Curses libraries' flavors.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesBackendType
files.Summary: Lists the supported backend Curses libraries.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesCharEvent
files.Summary: Character input event.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesEvent
files.Summary: The base type for all back-end independent Curses events.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesKeyEvent
files.Summary: Key input event.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesMouseEvent
files.Summary: Mouse input event.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesMouseState
files.Summary: Curses mouse event - encapsulates the data sent by the backend related to mouse events.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.CursesResizeEvent
files.Summary: Terminal resize event.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.NCursesKeyCode
files.Summary: NCurses specific key codes.

files.Title: Sharpie.Backend.PdCursesKeyCode
files.Summary: PDCurses specific key codes.

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas.CheckGlyphStyle
files.Summary: The possible shapes used by the check.

files.Summary: The types fills.

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas.GlyphSize
files.Summary: Describes the size of a glyph.

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas.GradientGlyphStyle
files.Summary: The gradient style.

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas.LineStyle
files.Summary: The possible line styles used in .

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas.Orientation
files.Summary: Describes the available text orientations.

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas.ShadeGlyphStyle
files.Summary: The types of possible shades.

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas.TriangleGlyphStyle
files.Summary: Describes the orientation of a glyph.

files.Title: Sharpie.Canvas
files.Summary: A general-purpose drawing surface that can be latter draw onto any object that implements . Supports multiple types of drawing operations most commonly used in terminal apps.

files.Title: Sharpie.CaretMode
files.Summary: Defines the caret mode.

files.Title: Sharpie.ClearStrategy
files.Summary: Defines the possible strategies of clearing contents of a window.

files.Title: Sharpie.ColorManager
files.Summary: Exposes functionality to manage colors.

files.Title: Sharpie.ColorMixture
files.Summary: Defines a color pair (foreground and background colors).

files.Title: Sharpie.ColorMode
files.Summary: Defines the color mode of the terminal.

files.Title: Sharpie.ControlCharacter
files.Summary: Defines a list of special control characters in ASCII.

files.Title: Sharpie.CursesException
files.Summary: A generic Curses exception, base for all other curses errors.

files.Title: Sharpie.CursesInitializationException
files.Summary: Exception thrown if Curses failed to initialize.

files.Title: Sharpie.CursesOperationException
files.Summary: A Curses exception raised when an operation fails.

files.Title: Sharpie.CursesSynchronizationException
files.Summary: Exception thrown if operation performed in an unauthorized context (such as different thread).

files.Title: Sharpie.DelegateEvent
files.Summary: Special event that delegates an object to the main application context.

files.Title: Sharpie.Event
files.Summary: An event from the terminal.

files.Title: Sharpie.EventPump
files.Summary: The event "pump" class listens to all events from Curses, processes them and passes them along to consumers.

files.Title: Sharpie.EventType
files.Summary: Defines the possible event types.

files.Title: Sharpie.Font.AsciiFont
files.Summary: Defines the traits implemented by ASCII font providers.

files.Title: Sharpie.Font.AsciiFontLayout
files.Summary: Defines the possible font layout modes.

files.Title: Sharpie.Font.DosCp866AsciiFont
files.Summary: DOS CodePage 866 font. Uncovered in the depths of Alexandru's prehistoric archives. Original source unknown.

files.Title: Sharpie.Font.FigletFont
files.Summary: FIGlet ASCII font. See http://www.jave.de/figlet/figfont.html and https://github.com/cmatsuoka/figlet for details and available fonts.

files.Title: Sharpie.Key
files.Summary: Defines the possible key types.

files.Title: Sharpie.KeyEvent
files.Summary: Defines a key event.

files.Title: Sharpie.KeySequenceResolver
files.Summary: Contains the definitions and implementations of input middlewares.

files.Title: Sharpie.ModifierKey
files.Summary: Defines the possible modifier keys.

files.Title: Sharpie.MouseActionEvent
files.Summary: Contains the details of a Curses event.

files.Title: Sharpie.MouseButton
files.Summary: Defines the possible mouse buttons.

files.Title: Sharpie.MouseButtonState
files.Summary: Defines the possible mouse button states.

files.Title: Sharpie.MouseMoveEvent
files.Summary: Defines a mouse move event.

files.Title: Sharpie.Pad
files.Summary: Represents a Curses pad, which is a special type of off-screen window.

files.Title: Sharpie.ReplaceStrategy
files.Summary: Defines the possible strategies or replacing the contents of a window with the contents of another window.

files.Title: Sharpie.ResolveEscapeSequenceFunc
files.Summary: Defines the next delegate used to resolve key sequences.

files.Title: Sharpie.Screen
files.Summary: The main Curses screen class. Implements screen-related functionality. Only one instance of this class can be active at one time.

files.Title: Sharpie.SoftLabelKeyAlignment
files.Summary: Defines the alignment of labels in a .

files.Title: Sharpie.SoftLabelKeyManager
files.Summary: Adds support for soft function keys.

files.Title: Sharpie.SoftLabelKeyMode
files.Summary: Defines the possible strategies of clearing contents of a window.

files.Title: Sharpie.StandardColor
files.Summary: Defines the well-known standard video colors.

files.Title: Sharpie.StartEvent
files.Summary: Generated automatically when starts listening for events.

files.Title: Sharpie.StopEvent
files.Summary: Generated automatically when stops listening for events.

files.Title: Sharpie.Style
files.Summary: Represents the style of the text (attributes and colors).

files.Title: Sharpie.StyledText
files.Summary: Describes a text with mixed in styles. Can be used by .

files.Title: Sharpie.SubPad
files.Summary: Represents a Curses sub-pad and contains all it's functionality.

files.Title: Sharpie.SubWindow
files.Summary: Represents a Curses sub-window and contains all it's functionality.

files.Title: Sharpie.Surface
files.Summary: Represents a surface and contains all its functionality.

files.Title: Sharpie.Terminal
files.Summary: This class allows the developer to interact with the terminal and its settings. This is the main class that is used in a Curses-based application.

files.Title: Sharpie.TerminalOptions
files.Summary: Stores the terminal options.

files.Title: Sharpie.TerminalResizeEvent
files.Summary: The terminal resized event.

files.Title: Sharpie.TerminalSurface
files.Summary: Represents a screen-bound surface and contains all its functionality.

files.Title: Sharpie.VideoAttribute
files.Summary: Defines the possible video attributes.

files.Title: Sharpie.Window
files.Summary: Represents a Curses window and contains all it's functionality.
